price: 196. Anu Sin Yallittek mannal meesitaa? Diggah Yi dacayrii kee Yi catoh awlayti Yallay Qhuraan kitab yol oobise kinnik, usuk isi naqoosak meqe mara cataah dacrisah addunyaay akeeral.
arabic: إِنَّ وَلِـِّۧيَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلَّذِي نَزَّلَ ٱلۡكِتَٰبَۖ وَهُوَ يَتَوَلَّى ٱلصَّٰلِحِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: inna waliyyiya al-lahu alladhī nazzala al-kitāba wahuwa yatawallā al-ṣāliḥīna
